ProjectRoot.TagLine: The .Net web development framework that gets out of your way
ProjectRoot.Name: FubuMVC

PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.Diagnostics
PublishedNuget.Description: A complete look into what's going on inside your FubuMVC application. Once active, diagnostics will be found under /_fubu

PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.Katana
PublishedNuget.Description: Run FubuMVC applications using Katana and OWIN

PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.Razor
PublishedNuget.Description: Support for using the Razor view engine within a FubuMVC application.

PublishedNuget.Name: FubuMVC.Spark
PublishedNuget.Description: Support for using the Spark view engine within a FubuMVC application.
